column2: Citizen Men White Dial Eco-Drive Watch
column19:
• Product Description
  • Product Details

  • It starts with a simple
column20:
yet revolutionary concept: a watch that never needs a battery. citizen Eco-Drive technology harnesses the power of light - from any natural or artificial light source - and converts it into energy which is stored in a permanently rechargeable lithium-ion cell. It recharges continuously in any kind of light to run forever. So choose this watch for the ultimate convenience and to indulge your love for anything high-tech!

Case diameter: 40 mm
Case thickness: 2 mm
Dial shape: Round
International Warranty: 1 year
Warranty in India: 3 years 3 months 3 days

Stainless steel round case
Steel strap with a butterfly clasp
White dial with black hands
Branding on the dial
Screw to reset time
Date aperture on the dial
Eco-Drive
Solid case back made of stainless steel for enhanced durability
Water resistance up to 50 metres
column21: allowing you to wear it even when showering
